src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitryāśayo dānaṃ dadāti /  duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāśayaḥ /  guṇavatsu muditāśayaḥ /  (Dutt 90) upakāriṣu mitreṣu suhṛtsūpekṣāśayaḥ /  idamapi bodhisattvasya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /  punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo dānavibandhanamapi dānavibandhapratipakṣamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 《瑜伽》三十九云「又諸菩薩於施障及對治如實了知。

src_original: pūrvako 'nabhyāsaḥ /  deyadharmaparīttatāvaikalyam /  agre manorame ca vastuni gṛddhiḥ āyatyāñca bhogasampatti phaladarśanābhinandanatā /
tgt_original: 一先未串習、二施物尠闕、三耽著上妙物、四欣樂當來具足財果。

src_original: yataśca bodhisattvasya deyadharmeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu yācanake ca samyagupasthite dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /  so 'nabhyāsakṛto me 'yaṃ doṣa iti laghu ladhveva prajñayā pratisidhyati /
tgt_original: 一若諸菩薩現有種種可施財物，乞者現前而施心不發，即以正慧知我於施先未串習過失。

src_original: evañca punaḥ pratividhyati /  nūnaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ dānaṃ na dattaṃ yena me etarhi samyak saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu samyak pratyupasthite ca yācanake dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
tgt_original: 決定知我先世於施未曾串習，致今有財乞者現前而施心不發。

src_original: sa cedetarhina pratisaṃkhyāya dāsyāmi punarapi me āyatyāṃ dānavidveṣo bhaviṣyati /  sa eva pratibidhya dānapratibandhapratipakṣa niśṛtya pratisaṃkhyāya dadāti /
tgt_original: 若今世不強施者，復來世定背施行，是故菩薩力勵思擇而行慧施。

src_original: nābhyāsakṛtadoṣānusārī bhavati na tadvaśagaḥ /  punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa cedyad yācanake samyak pratyupasthite parīttabhogatayā  dāne cittaṃ na krāmati sa ta vighātakṛta dānavipratibandhahetuṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā  pratividhya tadvighātakṛtaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayan pratisaṃkhyāya kāruṇyāddānaṃ dadāti /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 二乞者現前，由財物少施心不發。

src_original: pūrvakarmadoṣeṇa vā paravineyatayā vā mayā bahūni pragāḍhāni kṣut pipāsādikāni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni bhave vinā parānugraham /
tgt_original: 以正慧通達，或由我宿業有過失故、或由現在繫屬他故，令我現受飢渴等苦，不能益一切眾生。

src_original: yadi ca me maraṇāya kālakriyāyai savarteta etaddānakṛta parānugrahahetuka dṛṣṭe dharme duḥkha tathāpi me dānameva śreyo na tu yācanakanirākaraṇam  prāgeva yaḥ kaścidyena kenacicchākapatreṇa jīvati ityevaṃ bodhisattvastadvighātakṛtaṃ dukhamadhivāsya dāna dadāti /
tgt_original: 設令行施乃至殞殄猶為最勝，況有菜葉可以活命，是故忍苦而行慧施。

src_original: panarapara bodhisattvasya samyag yācake pratyupasthite sa cedadhimātramanāpatvādagryatvāddeyavastuno  dāne citta na krāmati ta bodhisattvo gardhakṛt doṣa laghu-laghveva pratijñayā pratividhya
tgt_original: 三乞者現前，由可施物妙，施心不發。 即以正慧通達，是我耽著過失。

src_original: duḥkhe me eṣa sukhasaṃjñāviparyāsaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanaka iti viparyāsaparijñānāttañca
tgt_original: 我今於苦妄生樂想，由此顛倒生當來苦，是故菩薩勵力行施。

src_original: prahāya prati saṃkhyāya tadvastu dadāti /  punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa ceddānaṃ dattvā dānaphale (Dutt 91)  mahābhogatāyāmanuśaṃsadarśanamutpadyate nānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taṃ bodhisattvo
tgt_original: 四若菩薩施已，欣樂當來大財利果，不求無上正等菩提，即以正慧通達是邪果見過失，觀彼諸行皆念念滅，所受用果速疾滅盡、速疾離散，是故滅彼樂邪果見施行，迴向無上菩提。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
tgt_original: 菩薩從勝解行地隨入淨勝意樂地時，云何超過諸惡趣等？ 答：

src_original: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi  sambhāro daśottareṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭenākāraśatena sattveṣvanukampāṃ bhāvayapyananyamanasikāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩依止世間清淨靜慮，於勝解行地己善積集菩提資糧，於如前說百一十苦諸有情類，修習哀愍無餘思惟。

src_original: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /  yenāpāyān sattvānāmarthe 'gārāvasāyogenādhitiṣṭhati /
tgt_original: 由此修習為因緣故，於彼色類諸有情所得哀愍意樂及悲意樂，由是因緣為利惡趣諸有情故，誓居惡趣如己舍宅。 作是誓言：

src_original: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /
tgt_original: 我若唯住如是處所能證無上正等菩提，亦能忍受，為除一切有情苦故。

src_original: sarvāñca sattvānāmāpāyikaṃ karma tena śuddhenāśayenātmavaipākyamicchati /  atyantañca sarvākuśalakarmāsamudācārāya mānaṃ saṃpraṇidhatte /
tgt_original: 一切有情諸惡趣業，以淨意樂悉願自身代彼領受苦異熟果，為令畢竟一切惡業永不現行，一切善業常現行故，心發正願：

src_original: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
tgt_original: 彼由修習如是世間清淨靜慮悲願力故，一切惡趣諸煩惱品所有麁重於自所依皆得除遣。
